```{r include = FALSE}
# Load required libraries
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
# Downloaded from https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/annual-cancer-incidence
# Number of new cancer registrations in Scotland by sex and age since 1992
# Publication Date 24 April 2018
incidence_data_scotland <- read_csv("data/opendata-inc9216-scotland.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  # There is only one unique country code in the dataset (S92000003 [Scotland]), so it is safe to remove
  select(
    -country
  )
```
